response.original_title: Megacity: When Night Falls in Istanbul
response.overview: Caught between tradition, chaos, and constant change — how does Istanbul, with its 16 million residents, manage to thrive as a modern global city despite all its tensions?
response.tagline: Tradition, chaos, and constant upheaval — Istanbul’s balancing act as a 16-million-strong global metropolis.
response.title: Megacity: When Night Falls in Istanbul
